name: Toralf, God of Fury // Toralf's Hammer
type_line: Legendary Creature — God // Legendary Artifact — Equipment

card_faces.name: Toralf, God of Fury
card_faces.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls is dealt excess noncombat damage, Toralf, God of Fury deals damage equal to the excess to any target other than that permanent.

card_faces.name: Toralf's Hammer

name: "Wake the Draugr"
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target creature cards that share a creature type from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Boreal Outrider
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, if {S} of any of any of that spell's color was spent to cast it, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

name: "Jack and Jill Storm the Hill"
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II — Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
III — Exile a creature with the greatest power among creatures target opponent controls.

name: "Kardur, Doomscourge"
oracle_text:
When "Kardur, Doomscourge" enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.
Whenever an attacking creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: "Kardur, Doomscourge"
oracle_text:
When "Kardur, Doomscourge" enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.
Whenever an attacking creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Dogged Pursuit
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Kaya had stalked countless horrific foes, but never one that killed with such callous precision and twisted creativity.

name: Open the Omenpaths
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Add two mana of any one color and two mana of any other color. Spend this mana only to cast creature or enchantment spells.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Tergrid's Shadow
oracle_text:
Each player sacrifices two creatures.
Foretell {2}{B}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Tegrid, god of fight, never acknowledges her own shadow . . . or its murderous deeds.

name: Run Ashore
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Which one of you slug-brained milksops forgot to make an offering to Cosima?"
—Jolkur, navigator

name: "Raiding Karve"
oracle_text:
Whenever "Raiding Karve" attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: "Big-Booty Ox"
oracle_text: You may use "Big-Booty Ox"'s toughness to crew rather than its power.

name: Elderfang Disciple
oracle_text: When Elderfang Disciple enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: "One day, the great serpent will rejoin us on Skemfar, and those who've wronged us will taste our venom."

name: "Midas Touch't"
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles, and its abilities can't be activated unless they are mana abilities.

name: Feed the Serpent
flavor_text: He spent the final moments of his existence tumbling down the length of the serpent's jaws, driven mad by the magnitude of the Cosmos.
